summary: THE PONTIAC G6 2006 HAS A PROBLEM WITH ITS STEERING.  THE DRIVER HAS TO HAVE MUSCLES IN ORDER TO MAKE A TURN. IF IT IS A SHARP TURN YOU WILL BE UP ON THE CURB. THIS PROBLEM IS CONSTANT AND IS A SEVERE SAFETY ISSUE.  ONE WOULD THINK THE CAR COMPANY WOULD RECALL THIS PROBLEM SINCE THEY DID RECALL FOR THIS ISSUE UP UNTIL THE YEAR OF 2005!!! PLEASE HELP!! *TR
